dialogues.text: Suddenly, one silhouette stops glitching. It solidifies into a real form: KAI, a partially reconstructed person.

dialogues.speaker: KAI (NPC)
dialogues.text: "You’re not part of the recursion. You’re awake."

dialogues.speaker: KAI
dialogues.text: "Doesn’t matter. I was... someone. Before SHARD hollowed me out and fed on what made me me."
